Class Pulse

java.lang.Object
  infrastructure.Component
      infrastructure.SelfRegisteringComponent
          Pulse
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDrawable, IUpdateable
public class Pulse
extends SelfRegisteringComponent

Pulsing circle effect Self registers with parent app and removes itself automatically with die() event

Author:
Gadi

Creates a new animated growing and fading circle

i_Diameter - diameter of circle
i_Color - color of circle
i_LifeTime - lifetime of the circle
